value.name: Pleasant Ridge is Mr. Cooper’s school – get him back to work
value.description: I am just a little bit appalled by the news that Derek Cooper has been removed from his job over some used light fixtures. There is not a more dedicated school employee anywhere in the county. I still have one more daughter at Pleasant Ridge, and I don’t ...

value.name: Bolton man met ex-partner outside pub armed with knife and screwdriver
value.description: A man has been sentenced after meeting his ex-partner with a knife and screwdriver. Derek Cooper, 57 of Gidlow Lane, Bolton, arrived outside of a pub where he knew his former partner was on ...
